title: RADS Error !! I tried almost everything installed lol like 100 times!!
body:
RADS Error !! I tried almost everything, installed lol like 100 times!!
i  installed 6.5 gb file once a day i even installed windows 7 again for it tried running as admin tried network sharing center's Internet protocol changing..
I don't wanna quit Playing lol but this has gone far enough!! please give me a good solution for this or i have to stop playing -_-{{champion:62}} .

replies.body: This error is usually a result of OS or software security settings that is preventing the patcher and client from launching.  Running as admin can be a temporary workaround sometimes, but doesn't resolve the issue for good.  Your best bet is to go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and make sure that the game is allowed to not only launch, but also scan game files.  Hopefully, that will get the issue fixed up!
